__comment01__: Specify the path for videos you have
__comment02__: Specify the path for storing resized videos
__comment03__: Specify the path for storing intermediate files
__comment04__: Default hyperparameters for cnn classifiers in the model search space
__comment05__: Default hyperparameters for the user classifier
__comment06__: Specify the path of input data for the teacher model if using knowledge distillation
